title: Renovated 3 Bedroom Apartment, Historic Bldg near Lowertown
posting_body: ['Renovated 3 Bedroom Apartment in Historic Building Near Downtown St Paul', '*', 'This building was the winner of a Heritage Preservation Award from the City of St Paul in 2016!', '*', '361 Bates Ave #2, Saint Paul, MN 55106', '$1745/mo', 'Available Sept 1st', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Year Built:', '1900', 'Sq Footage:', '1250 sqft.', 'Bedrooms:', '3 Beds', 'Bathrooms:', '1 Full Bath', 'Parking:', 'Up to 2 Garage Stalls may be available for an additional fee)/On-street parking is always available', 'Lease Duration:', '12 Months (See Details Below)', 'Available:', 'Aug 1st', 'Deposit:', '$1745', 'Pets Policy:', 'Sorry, No Pets', 'Laundry:', 'In Building', 'Floor:', 'This unit spans the entire 2nd Floor of the building', 'Property Type:', '4-plex Apartment', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Located in a vibrant neighborhood just steps from Metro State University, this Historic Building recently underwent a COMPLETE RENOVATION and was the recipient of a Heritage Preservation Award from the City of St Paul.', "Also within walking distance are; Mississippi Market, Swede Hollow Cafe and Park, Coffee Shop, Yeorg Brewing and Saloon and it's near other popular destinations like Minnesota Music Cafe, St Paul Brewery (formerly Flat Earth), Brunson's Pub, Tongue in Cheek Restaurant and much more!", 'The rejuvenated Lowertown area of St Paul bustles with a variety of new pubs and dining establishments and is also very close...', "There's lots to do in the area!", 'Inside, this large apartment feels just like a single family home.', "You'll love the main living area with a wide open layout from the kitchen and dining areas to the living room.", 'Original hardwood floors meet tiled bathroom and kitchen flooring.', 'Original natural trim and exposed brick chimney add to the authentic feel here.', 'Numerous south-facing windows offer abundant natural light.', 'Greet neighbors from the front porch.', 'Sip your morning coffee or an evening cocktail while relaxing on your private, second-story back porch overlooking the downtown skyline.', 'Walk or ride your bike along the Bruce Vento Trail to catch a St Paul Saints (now the AAA affiliate of the Minnesota Twins) game at CHS Field this summer, or take in Music in the Park at Mears Park...', "It's all here - what a great place to live!", 'ADDITIONAL RENTAL FEATURES', 'Vintage building', 'Private Porch overlooking Downtown St Paul', 'Stainless steel appliances', 'Walk in Pantry', 'NEW high-efficiency Hot Water heat', 'Newer Appliances', 'BEAUTIFUL Refinished Hardwood Floors', 'Newer Kitchen, Newer bath, Newer Plumbing and Electric Systems', 'LAUNDRY in building', 'Ceiling fans', 'Please send initial inquiries by email via the link provided on this page.', 'Thank you!', 'LEASE TERMS', '- Tenant pays only Electricity and Cable (if desired).', '- Owner pays for Heat, Gas, Trash, Sewer and Water.', '- This is a No Smoking building', '- Sorry, No Pets', 'Features include; Vintage building, original hardwood floors, exposed brick fireplace detail, walk-in pantry, large bedrooms, high ceilings, private back porch, shared front porch, completely updated mechanicals, new windows, light fixtures, plumbing fixtures, etc.', '**', 'Sorry, this landlord does not participate in the Section 8 program.', '**', '* PLEASE review Eligibility Requirements below-', 'Thank you! *', 'We are a fair housing provider.', 'We do not discriminate against persons on the basis of race, color, creed, national origin, religion, sex, sexual orientation, familial status, status with regard to public assistance, disability or any other protected status.', 'Each tenant 18 and older planning to reside at the property must fill out an application.', 'There is a $40 fee per applicant.', 'We will obtain a third-party credit check, landlord/rental reference check, eviction check, employment verification and criminal background check.', 'Eligibility:', 'Your application may be rejected for one or more of the following reasons:', '* Not being able to provide photo ID', '* Not having verifiable, reliable and predictable monthly income of at least 2.5 times the monthly rent', '* Having a prior eviction or Unlawful Detainer within the past 3 years', '* Owing a debt to a former Landlord or utility company', '* Having a felony conviction for assault, arson, sex offense or certain other violent crimes within the past 10 years', '* Having a felony conviction in the last 5 years for a drug offense or certain other non-violent crimes.', '* Having a Misdemeanor and Gross Misdemeanor with a date of sentencing within the past 3 years.', '* Providing false or misleading information or omitting material information from the application.', 'Contact info:', 'Please e-mail via the link in this ad, Thank You!', 'Dennis Kuchenmeister, Realtor®', 'RE/MAX Results']
